### ✅ Checklist
- [ ] 🧪 Tests passing (`cargo test --workspace`)
- [ ] 🔍 Clippy warnings resolved (`cargo clippy --workspace`)

- [ ] 🔒 Security considerations addressed
- [ ] 📊 Performance impact assessed
